keyword: how many calories in an uncrustable
title: How Many Calories in an Uncrustable?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in an uncrustable, including full nutrition breakdown with carbs, protein, fat, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in an Uncrustable?
assumptions: Standard Smucker's Peanut Butter & Grape Jelly Uncrustable sandwich (66g), thawed, no added toppings or modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand, serving size, and preparation; values based on average product data. Check packaging for exact info.

quick_answer.text: One standard Uncrustable provides about 210 kcal, with 6g protein and 28g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts panel for quick comparison to product labels.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Uncrustable?
faqs.a: Approximately 210 kcal for a standard peanut butter and jelly Uncrustable.

faqs.q: What are the macros in an Uncrustable?
faqs.a: About 28g carbs, 9g fat, 6g protein, and 2g fiber per sandwich.
Typically 0g trans fat, but check the label for your specific flavor.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in an Uncrustable?
faqs.a: Around 12g total sugars from the jelly and bread.
About 170mg sodium per sandwich, which is moderate for a snack.
